UniprotID	P13796
Accession	P13796;B2R613;B4DUA0;Q5TBN4
EntryName	PLSL_HUMAN
ProteinName	Plastin-2 (L-plastin) (LC64P) (Lymphocyte cytosolic protein 1) (LCP-1)
GeneName	LCP1 PLS2
Length	627
Function	Actin-binding protein (PubMed:16636079, PubMed:17294403, PubMed:28493397). Plays a role in the activation of T-cells in response to costimulation through TCR/CD3 and CD2 or CD28 (PubMed:17294403). Modulates the cell surface expression of IL2RA/CD25 and CD69 (PubMed:17294403).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cell junction; Cell projection; Cell projection; Ruffle membrane
